description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability associated with the Windows Bluetooth driver:

1. Download and apply the relevant updates for your Windows version from the official update catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure the updates are properly integrated.

**Details**:
- Critical vulnerabilities related to the Bluetooth driver can be alleviated by applying KB5033375 for versions 23H2 and 22H2, while KB5033369 is applicable for version 21H2.
- Ensure your system aligns with one of the following build numbers:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.2861
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.2861
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.2652

**Preconditions**:
- Verify which version of Windows 11 is currently installed on your system.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation to prevent any data loss.

For manual installation, download the update packages from:
- [KB5033369 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033369)
- [KB5033375 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033375)
